post.body: Reachd bilaspur l8 last nyt aftr a marathon 2day journey, changing trains thrice. Xpected 2 take off wid things in ful flight in smtym :)
Connected my twitter with Vakow! It's cheaper to post and works on all mobile operators in India. Visit http://www.vakow.com/twitter/
